comment: This file shows the expected JSON format for events from your Dify workflow

single_event_example.title: Standard Chartered KL Marathon 2024
single_event_example.description: Join thousands of runners in Malaysia's premier marathon event. Experience the vibrant streets of Kuala Lumpur with multiple race categories available.

data.title: Standard Chartered KL Marathon 2024
data.description: Join thousands of runners in Malaysia's premier marathon event. Experience the vibrant streets of Kuala Lumpur with multiple race categories available.

data.title: Penang Bridge International Marathon
data.description: Run across one of Malaysia's most iconic bridges. This annual event attracts runners from around the world.

field_descriptions.id: Optional - Unique identifier for the event (string)
field_descriptions.title: Required - Event name/title (string)
field_descriptions.description: Required - Short description of the event, 1-3 sentences (string)
field_descriptions.city: Required - City name where event takes place (string, e.g., 'Kuala Lumpur', 'Penang')
field_descriptions.location: Required - Full location/venue address (string, e.g., 'Dataran Merdeka, Kuala Lumpur')
field_descriptions.website: Optional - URL to event's official website (string, must be valid URL)
field_descriptions.image: Optional - URL to event image/photo (string, must be valid image URL)

minimal_example.title: KL Marathon 2024
minimal_example.description: Annual marathon event in Kuala Lumpur
